version_description:
Thank you Big Win players for making Big Win Hockey the #1 Hockey game on the App Store.

As the Playoffs heat up we are super excited to bring you more features and gameplay for your favorite hockey game.

* FRIENDS MODE - Add and play against your friends through Facebook. Who will own the bragging rights?

* EVENTS MODE - Play in exciting competitions against other teams in the world and compete for huge Big Bucks prizes and your place in history!

* POSITION CHEMISTRY - Build your dream team and get players in the correct position for a bonus to your overall team rating!

* BIG UNIFORM PACKS - Grab a Big Uniform pack and sport the best uniforms on the ice!

* BIG RUSH PACKS - The Big Rush pack gives you a chance to find Superstar players with super high ratings.

* SKIP TO PERIOD - Now start watching from the 1st, 2nd or 3rd period and enjoy a quick-fix experience!

Thank you Big Win players for making Big Win Hockey the #1 Hockey game on the App Store.

As the Playoffs heat up we are super excited to bring you more features and gameplay for your favorite hockey game.

* Minor Bug Fixes

As well as:

* FRIENDS MODE - Add and play against your friends through Facebook. Who will own the bragging rights?

* EVENTS MODE - Play in exciting competitions against other teams in the world and compete for huge Big Bucks prizes and your place in history!

* POSITION CHEMISTRY - Build your dream team and get players in the correct position for a bonus to your overall team rating!

* BIG UNIFORM PACKS - Grab a Big Uniform pack and sport the best uniforms on the ice!

* BIG RUSH PACKS - The Big Rush pack gives you a chance to find Superstar players with super high ratings.

* SKIP TO PERIOD - Now start watching from the 1st, 2nd or 3rd period and enjoy a quick-fix experience!

This update now contains the awesome video capture and edit feature, EVERYPLAY.

With EVERPLAY you can now watch a game, then record and edit your favourite moments and upload them to the EVERYPLAY community for other Big Win fans to see.

Start recording and posting your Big Win Hockey game highlights and best player moments today!

Fresh for the 2013-14 hockey season is our biggest update yet. Get your elite team ready for the opening faceoff including:

* ENHANCED FRIENDS MODE - Challenge your Facebook friends and battle it out to be the best. Track head to head stats to see who is truly the greatest.

* QUICK GAME MODE - You wanted it so we listened! Now you can grab a bite-sized bit of hockey action to train your team with Quick Game Mode.

* BIG UNIFORM STORE - Looking for some new threads for your team, grab a Big Uniform pack and hit the ice with style.

* Minor bug fixes.
We had our engineers clean the ice and we gave the players a stern talking too.
Sent some bugs to the dressing room and we have laid down fresh ice for iOS 10.
We had our engineers clean the ice and we gave the players a stern talking too.
BIG Updates for more Hockey fun!
